task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 280°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will tilt my view upwards to see the roof.
I can now see the top of the building, so I will look down to see the base to get a complete view of its height.

Having viewed the top and bottom of the building, I can now estimate its height by counting the floors; it appears to be about 8 stories high, and assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters, the total height is approximately 28 meters.
